long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A more polished New Tab Page that takes inspiration from Chrome's new tab page.

- Save bookmarks, images and notes to each of your folders
- Save screenshot thumbnails of your bookmarks (if you want)
- Easy searching of all your saved items
- Tag images with keywords
- Drag and drop reordering
- View list of upcoming and top rated movies
- View 5 day weather forecast
- Launch an image editor in your browser
- Automatically syncs across machines (if you're logged into Chrome)
